# MKMapConfiguration.ElevationStyle.flat

**Case**

The value that represents the flat map elevation style.

## Declaration

```swift
case flat
```

## Constants

- **MKMapConfiguration.ElevationStyle.realistic**: The value that represents a map elevation style with realistic ground contours.
